oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (KVOO) - 1948-04-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK radio program of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band, including Jimmy Hall (fiddle, vocals). Originally broadcast 1948-04-03 at 12:15 pm (CST). Sponsored by Wat Henry, with announcer Johnny Ryan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Station announcement -- Opening statement (Johnny Ryan) -- Opening theme (Steel Guitar Rag) -- Johnny Ryan introduces Leon McAuliffe -- Under The Double Eagle (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Wat Henry commercial (Johnny Ryan) -- What Is Life Without Love (Jimmy Hall vocals, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe announce the band's appearance schedule -- You're From Texas (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan reads listener requests -- A Good Man Is Hard To Find (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Wat Henry commercial (Johnny Ryan) -- Stay A Little Longer (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Johnny Ryan) -- Station announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Ryan, Johnny (Announcer); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-
